Interface ScreenLifeCycle

All Known Implementing Classes:
AcceptOrDeclineScreen, AdministratorScreen, AdminViewAndManageMedicationScreen, AppointmentScreen, CalendarScreen, CancelAppointmentScreen, DoctorAvailabilityScreen, DoctorConfigurationScreen, DoctorScreen, LoginScreen, LogoutScreen, MainScreen, MedicalRecordScreen, NotificationScreen, OptionScreen, PaginationTableScreen, PastOutcomeRecordsScreen, PatientConfigurationScreen, PatientMedicalRecordsScreen, PatientScreen, PharmacistConfigurationScreen, PharmacistScreen, PharmacistViewAndManageAppointmentOutcomeRecordScreen, PharmacistViewAndManageMedicationScreen, ReplenishmentRequestScreen, RescheduleAppointmentScreen, Screen, SinglePaginationTableScreen, UpdateConsultationNotesScreen, UpdatePatientMedicalScreen, ViewAndManageMedicationScreen, ViewAndManageUsersScreen, ViewAvailableDoctorScreen, ViewMoreDetailsAppointmentScreen, ViewScheduledAppointmentsScreen
public interface ScreenLifeCycle
Interface to define the lifecycle of a screen in the application.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onBack(Screen backFromScreen)
    Called when navigating back from a screen.
    void
    onDisplay()
    Called when the screen is being display.
    void
    onFinish()
    Called when the screen is finishing.
    void
    onNextScreen(Screen nextScreen)
    Called when navigating to the next screen.
    void
    onRefresh()
    Called when the screen is being refreshed.
    void
    onStart()
    Called when the screen is starting.
